name: Drop The Bomb
description: Unique game combining the strategy and clicker experiences in a multi-player mode!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 (latest updates) with DX 9.0 Processor: Intel® Pentium® D или AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 7800GT или ATI Radeon™ X1950 Pro DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: An internet connection is required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 (latest updates) with DX 9.0 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2.4 GHz или AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 5600+ 2.8GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX™ 260 или ATI Radeon™ HD 4870 or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: An internet connection is required
